test.name: Verify Swag Labs Page Title Logo & Mascot

kw.name: open browser and maximize browser window
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

test.name: Verify Inventory Item Image, Title, Description and Price

kw.name: verify image, title, description, price of inventory item
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://div[contains(text(), "Sauce Labs Backpack")]//parent::a//parent::div//div[contains(text(), "carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.")]' is displayed.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
